casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Jeffery PERKINS, Defendant-Appellant. No. 08-10350

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. July 28, 2008. Kathleen M. Salyer, Anne R. Schultz, U.S. Attorney’s Office, Miami, FL, for Plaintiff-Appellee. Robin J. Farnsworth, Robert N. Berube, Federal Public Defender, Fort Lauder- dale, FL, Kathleen M. Williams, Miami, FL, for Defendant-Appellant. Before ANDERSON, HULL and MARCUS, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM:

Robin Farnsworth, appointed counsel for Jeffrey Perkins, has filed a motion to withdraw on appeal, supported by a brief prepared pursuant to Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967). Because independent review of the record confirms counsel’s conclusion that the record does not contain any potentially meritorious issues for appeal, we GRANT counsel’s motion to withdraw and AFFIRM Perkins’s conviction and sentence.
